title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
In this section, I will install and load the required R packages, being tidyverse and sf libraries/packages.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf)

title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Import Data

mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")

Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\Users\pierre\Desktop\p-haas\IS415\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex01\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21



cpg <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                layer = "CyclingPathGazette")

Reading layer `CyclingPathGazette' from data source 
  `C:\Users\pierre\Desktop\p-haas\IS415\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex01\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 2248 features and 0 fields
Geometry type: MULTILINESTRING
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 11854.32 ymin: 28347.98 xmax: 42626.09 ymax: 48948.15
CRS:           NA

title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
section: Checking Content of Data Frame Simple Feature
text:
Checking Content of Data Frame Simple Feature

st_geometry(mpsz)

Geometry set for 323 features 
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21

glimpse(mpsz)

title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Plotting Geospatial Data - Polygon Feature

plot(mpsz)

title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
text:
Plotting Geospatial Data - Polyline Feature

plot(cpg)

title: Hands-on Exercise - Session 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R
In-Class Exercise - Geospatial Data Wrangling
text:
Installing and Loading R Packages

Libraries - sf & tidyverse

pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse, readr)




Importing Data into R Workbook

Import shp file

nga_adm2 = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",
                   layer = "geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2") %>% st_transform(crs = 26391)

Reading layer `geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2' from data source 
  `C:\Users\pierre\Desktop\p-haas\IS415\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex02\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 774 features and 5 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2.668534 ymin: 4.273007 xmax: 14.67882 ymax: 13.89442
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84




Import csv file

wpdx_plus = read_csv("data/aspatial/Water_Point_Data_Exchange_-_Plus__WPdx__.csv")




Understanding the data

Nigeria Level-2 Administrative Boundary

st_geometry(nga_adm2)

Geometry set for 774 features 
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 28879.72 ymin: 30292.37 xmax: 1343798 ymax: 1094244
Projected CRS: Minna / Nigeria West Belt
First 5 geometries:



glimpse(nga_adm2)

Rows: 774
Columns: 6
$ shapeName  <chr> "Aba North", "Aba South", "Abadam", "Abaji", "Abak", "Abaka…
$ Level      <chr> "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "AD…
$ shapeID    <chr> "NGA-ADM2-72505758B79815894", "NGA-ADM2-72505758B67905963",…
$ shapeGroup <chr> "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NGA", "NG…
$ shapeType  <chr> "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "ADM2", "AD…
$ geometry   <MULTIPOLYGON [m]> MULTIPOLYGON (((552560.3 12..., MULTIPOLYGON (…

#   `#fecal_coliform_value` <dbl>, `#subjective_quality` <chr>, …




Proportion of Functional & Non-Functional water points

prop_func = sum(wpdx_plus$X.status_id=="Yes")/nrow(wpdx_plus)
print(prop_func)
